Key Match Events: India thrash England by 68 runs to reach final
England dismissed for 103 in 16.4 overs, chasing 172
India post 171-7 after Rohit hits fine fifty
Axar Patel named player of the match for his 3-23, including wickets of Jos Buttler, Moeen Ali, and Jonny Bairstow
Three wickets for Kuldeep Yadav, three for Axar Patel, and two for Jasprit Bumrah
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma: 'It's very satisfying to win this game. We worked really hard as a unit. To win like that was a great effort from everybody.'
England captain Jos Buttler: 'India outplayed us, certainly. We let them maybe get 20/25 too many on a challenging surface that they played well on. They fully deserved to win.'
Player of the match Axar Patel: 'I knew that the wicket was stopping and had something for the bowlers. I just tried to bowl in good areas.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and South Africa have been the best teams. They deserve to be there and it will be a great final.
India's devastation of Adelaide from two years ago is replaced by jubilation.
